content: jim & liz beanie pattern designed by juliana lustenader preparation sizes adult 20 hat will stretch up to 2 gauge 3 5 sts = 1 yarn 1 skein debbie bliss winter garden 109 yards 100 grams same color #03 bark needles size us #10 16 circular needles and double pointed needles or any needles size necessary to obtain correct gauge other materials stitch marker darning needle take time to save time always check your gauge pattern key begin pattern co cast on with circular needles co 72 sts pm and join in the round k knit begin 1x1 rib pattern k2tog knit 2 sts together 1x1 rib pattern *k1 p1 *repeat to the end of round p purl continue 1x1 rib pattern for 8 or preferred length of hat pm place marker note if you don t want the hat to fold over knit for only 5 before the decrease section decreases round 1 *continue in rib for 6 sts k2tog *repeat to end round 2 & all even rounds *knit the knits & purl the purls *repeat to end round 3 *continue rib for 5sts k2tog *repeat to end repeat this decrease pattern knitting one less stitch before k2tog in every odd round switch to dpns when stitches no longer fit comfortably on the circular needle finishing when there are 9 sts left remove marker and k2tog 2 more times 5 sts left strand left over yarn through remaining stitches weave in ends and wear want more patterns like this visit ww ravelry com/designers/jules-lustenader february 24 2016 version 2 designed by juliana lustenader all rights reserved
